subject: Baseball
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: The Mets may not have Jose Reyes or J. J. Putz — or a host of others, for that matter — but they were still better than the worst team in baseball, edging the Nationals in 10 innings.
snippet: The Mets may not have Jose Reyes or J. J. Putz — or a host of others, for that matter — but they were still better than the worst team in baseball, edging the Nationals in 10 innings.
